title: Soap stars share their 'normal jobs' after Katie Jarvis work shamed
text:
Katie Jarvis shockingly got a normal job

(Picture: BBC)

Coronation Street, EastEnders and Hollyoaks stars have all come forward to share the ‘normal jobs’ they’ve undertaken over the years so they could, you know, live.

A number of famous faces publicly-listed roles they have taken up over the years so they could earn a living just like the rest of us after it was revealed Katie Jarvis found work as a security guard at B&M while in-between acting.

Bronagh Waugh, who played Cheryl Brady in Hollyoaks, tweeted: ‘Since leaving Hollyoaks I have had some amazing TV & film gigs but I’ve also had loads of times of being out of ‘work’ so have worked as a nanny, a cleaner, and a teacher and I am proud of every single one of those jobs.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Soap stars share their 'normal jobs' after Katie Jarvis shamed for earning a living.
